# Corporate Governance

Gibraltar’s business is conducted by its employees, managers and officers under the direction of the chief executive officer and the oversight of its Board of Directors to enhance the Company’s long-term value for its shareholders. The Board is committed to maintaining the highest standards of corporate governance in the long-term interest of shareholders as well as Gibraltar’s other stakeholders, including employees, customers, suppliers, local communities, government and the public at large.

Gibraltar’s Board of Directors and management operate in accordance with a clearly defined set of corporate governance policies and practices pertaining to the mission, role and functions of the Board and the responsibilities of various Board committees, as well as ethical business conduct. The Board regularly reviews changing legal and regulatory requirements, evolving best practices and other developments and may, as a result, modify the Company’s corporate governance policies and practices from time to time, as appropriate.

­

Corporate Social Responsibility – Gibraltar Industries [Skip to main content](#main)

![planting in soil](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/csr-banner.jpg)

[ ![Gibraltar Industries](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/logo.svg) ](https://www.gibraltar1.com)

  1. [Home](https://www.gibraltar1.com "Go to Home.")
  2. Corporate Social Responsibility



# Corporate Social Responsibility

## Commitment to Our People, Our Communities, and the World

[2023 CSR Report](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf)

Gibraltar is dedicated to making a positive impact through a commitment to Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR). At Gibraltar, doing the right thing is in our DNA. We are committed to making a difference in the lives of the people who are touched by our business, and to creating meaningful impact every day through our work and relationships.

[2023 CSR Report](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf)

![Employees Fist bumping](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/Content-Sustainability-at-Gibraltar_Image.jpg)

### Sustainability at Gibraltar

We advance the art of engineering, science, and technology to shape critical advancements in comfortable living, sustainable power, and productive agriculture.

[Read Our CSR Report](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=7)

![](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/Voluntary-PTO-01.jpg)

### VOLUNTARY TIME OFF PROGRAM

We foster meaningful community engagement opportunities for our employees, promote workplace charitable giving, and give back to the communities in which we operate.

[Read Our CSR Report](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=30)

Bill Bosway Chief Executive Officer

> Corporate Social Responsibility is not a new concept or an independent initiative for our organization – it is simply what we do, it is who we are, it is how we operate, and it is interwoven in our core values.

[Read CEO Message](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=3)

[![Corporate Social Responsibility - Innovation](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/column-csr-innovation.jpg)](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=6%20)

### [Innovation](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=6%20)

Developing leading-edge technology and products that advance sustainability and improves our environmental impact.

[Learn more](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=6 )

[![Corporate Social Responsibility - Environment](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/column-csr-environment.jpg)](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=35%20)

### [Environment](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=35%20)

Committed to improving our carbon footprint, reduce energy consumption, and improve energy through renewable sources.

[Learn more](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=35 )

[![Corporate Social Responsibility - Foundation](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/column-csr-foundation.jpg)](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=7%20)

### [Foundation](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=7%20)

Through our three strategic pillars – a strong business system, portfolio management, organizational development.

[Learn more](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=7 )

[![Corporate Social Responsibility - Our People](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/column-csr-people.jpg)](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=24%20)

### [Our People](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=24%20)

Dedicated to developing our people as professionals, future leaders, and difference-makers.

[Learn more](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=24 )

[![Corporate Social Responsibility - Our Communities](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/column-csr-communities.jpg)](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=30%20)

### [Our Communities](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=30%20)

Sharing our success with the communities where we live and work is vital to our mission.

[Learn more](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=30 )

[![Corporate Social Responsibility - The World](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/column-csr-world.jpg)](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=31%20)

### [The World](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=31%20)

Making life better for the people and the planet. We promote sustainability across our value chain.

[Learn more](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=31 )

[![Corporate Social Responsibility - Today's Challenges](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/column-csr-todays-challenges.jpg)](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=10%20)

### [Today's Challenges](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=10%20)

Operating during today’s challenges has required focus, discipline, and diligence for our entire organization.

[Learn more](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=10 )

[![Corporate Social Responsibility - A Sustainable Future](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/column-csr-sustainable-future.jpg)](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=4%20)

### [A Sustainable Future](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=4%20)

We operate with our eyes on the present and towards the future, maintaining a healthy balance sheet while continually looking for smart ways to grow.

[Learn more](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/2023-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf#page=4 )

### [2022 CSR Report](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/2022-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf)

Our 2022 report highlights our continued commitment to Corporate Social Responsibility.

[2022 Gibraltar CSR Report](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/2022-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf)

### [2021 CSR Report](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/Inaugural-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf)

Our inaugural Corporate Social Responsibility report highlights our progress and our Environmental, Social, and Governance commitments.

[2021 Gibraltar CSR Report](https://www.gibraltar1.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/Inaugural-Gibraltar-Corporate-Social-Responsibility-Report.pdf)
